reqs: Pre-reqs: ASTR 200 and one of PHYS 210, EOSC 211, CPSC 302, CPSC 303.
description: Measurement of positions, motions, and distances in astronomy. Temperature, masses, and spectra of stars. Hertzsprung-Russell diagram. Quantitative stellar structure and evolution. Chemical composition of stars in different Galactic populations. Globular and open star clusters.
